src:
Sebelum Tutup Karir, Chiellini Ingin Juara Liga Champions Dulu
01 Nov 2019, 18:40 by Bola.net
Bola.net - Bek Juventus Giorgio Chiellini mendeklarasikan dirinya ingin mengoleksi trofi Liga Champions dan Euro 2020 lebih dahulu sebelum gantung sepatu.
Chiellini sudah kenyang makan asam garam di dunia sepak bola. Ia juga sudah mengoleksi banyak trofi.
Sejauh ini ia sudah mengemas 17 trofi juara bersama dengan Juventus. Semuanya di pentas domestik dan delapan di antaranya merupakan gelar Scudetto.
Di pentas Internasional, Chiellini belum pernah meraih trofi juara bersama skuat senior Italia. Sebelumnya ia pernah memenangi trofi Euro U-19 pada tahun 2003 dan Medali Perunggu Olimpiade 2004
text:
Before Close Career, Chiellini Wants Champions League Champion First
Nov 01 2019, 18:40 by Bola.net
Soccer - Juventus defender Giorgio Chiellini has declared he wants to collect the Champions League trophy and Euro 2020 before hanging up his boots.
Chiellini is full of eating sour salt in the world of football. He also has collected many trophies.
So far he has packed 17 championship trophies with Juventus. All on the domestic stage and eight of them are Scudetto titles.
On the international stage, Chiellini has never won a championship trophy with an Italian senior squad. He had previously won the Euro U-19 trophy in 2003 and the 2004 Olympic Bronze Medal
